Name: Forest Spring
About the game: Story With the arrival of spring, flowers and trees begin to open their leaves. Birds and bears reappear. The sky has literally recreated itself. nature healed itself. everything will not be limited to this. Malicious people were hiding in the forests. It's your job to clean them up! Forest Spring is a fps game that wants you to feel the forest to your bones and clear your enemies from the forest. You can be happy if you focus on the graphics rather than looking for a purpose in the game. Gameplay w: walking forward       e: interact a: walking left               left click: fire s: walk back                  right click: aim d: walking right             space: jump About The Game Advanced weapon mechanics Simple car driving and blasting actions Swimming in water Enemies waiting to be destroyed Wide nature landscape
